title: "implicit wrangler"
author: "Derek Sollberger"
format: html
---

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
implicit_raw <- readr::read_csv("DCP0129 Survey Student Analysis Report.csv")
```

```{r}
implicit_df <- implicit_raw |>
  select(seq(13, 25, 2)) |>
  set_names(paste0("graph", 1:7)) |>
  mutate(id = 1:n()) |>
  mutate(section = ifelse(id <= 73, "L02", "L01")) |>
  filter(id != 3)
```

```{r}
readr::write_csv(implicit_df, "implicit_bias_data.csv")
```
